column3: Mind to amend the commit subject to be more verbose?\n
utACK e290b2ab0055405099f5a4899b9f7aa506a2648d.\nI think a short unit or RPC test would be nice.\n
I think that in this case, it is also worth to mention the reason to cast the value to double in the source code!\n

> I think that in this case, it is also worth to mention the reason to cast the value to double in the source code!

Should be enough to mention it in the commit subject line, so when in doubt, you can always do `git blame`.
@maiiz You can change the commit subject line with `git commit --amend`, if you didn't know. Make sure to force push afterward.\n
